metadata.title: kathson Rabbit Hay Feeder Hay Manger Less Wasted Grass Holder Rack Removable Stainless Steel Crate Bowl Water Food Feeder for Rabbits Bunny Chinchilla Guinea Pigs
features: 【A Set Of Content】 1 hay feeder, 1 removable stainless steel bowl, 1 spoon. They are easily fixed in cage and keep the cage tidy. A set of products solves the feeding and watering problems of rabbits.

【Less Mess And Minimizing Waste】Our hay racks can hold enough grass to keep hay from falling onto the ground and contaminated with animal urine and feces, it keep pet food clean and fresh all the time, and reduce more clutter and waste.

【Separable Bowl】The removable hanging bowl is composed of a stainless steel inner bowl and a plastic outer bowl, which can be directly separated as two bowls, one for food and one for water. It is easy to clean and add food.

【Safe Material】The straw rack is made of high quality plastic, the removable hanging bowl is made of plastic and food grade stainless steel, and the spoon is made of plastic. Made with 100% premium-quality, strong to ensure your pet has a durable, long-lasting feeder.

【Easy Installation】Our rabbit feeder is fixed with rotating button and suction cups. It can be easily attached to any wire cage and its height can be adjusted freely. Not easy to knock over, easy to disassemble, easy to clean.
description: One set of our products is enough to solve the rabbit feeder problem. A hay rack with enough capacity, a detachable hanging bowl, and a food spoon to match. This feeder is ideal for rabbits, chinchillas, guinea pigs or other small animals. Putting hay and other foods in the feeder is good for your pet's health as it protects your pet's food from urine or feces and keeps food clean and fresh.

1. Hay rack holds hay in place and keeps them clean and fresh at all time, no more mess and minimizing the waste. 2. Rabbit hay rack easily attaches to any wire cage conveniently, also can be placed at anywhere your pet prefers. 3. Pet food bowl, can be directly fixed on the grid cage, you can use it as an ordinary bowl, can also be divided into two bowls, high-quality plastic and food grade stainless steel material, you can rest assured for pets to use. 4. Easy to install, no tools required. Easy to clean, simply wipe clean with a damp cloth and mild detergent. Wipe off again with a clean moistened cloth to remove any residue left. 5. Made with 100% premium-quality, durable and last long.
Material: high quality pp plastic and stainless steel Size: Hay Feeder: 12.6*5.5*4.7inches(L*H*W ); Bowl: 5.1*2.1inches Color: Hay Feeder: white, Bowl: blue, Spoon: yellow
1 x Hay Feeder 1 x Removable Hanging bowl 1 x Spoon

1.Please allow 1-3cm error due to manual measurement. Please make sure you do not mind before you bid. 2.Due to the difference between different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual color of the item. Thank you!
If you have any questions please feel free to contact us and we will try our best to solve them with in 24 hour.
Thank you for your purchase and support!
